question: What is the main objective of the 'MAMATA' scheme launched in Odisha?
option1: To reduce maternal and infant mortality rate
option2: To provide free health care to farmers
option3: To provide free education to girls from class I to VI
answer: To reduce maternal and infant mortality rate
explanation: \'MAMATA\' scheme of Odisha aims at reducing the maternal and infant mortality rate. It was launched in the year 2011.
